mapper.select: select t.RSADTLID, t.RSAID, t.ZX_MENTE_ORDERNO, t.ZX_MENTE_PAYSTATE from gresa_sa_dtl t where t.ZX_MENTE_ORDERNO = #{orderid}
mapper.update: update gresa_sa_dtl set ZX_MENTE_PAYSTATE=1 where ZX_MENTE_ORDERNO = #{orderid}
mapper.select: select distinct b.rsaid, b.zx_mente_paystate from gresa_sa_ds_doc a, gresa_sa_dtl b where a.gresasadocid=b.rsaid and a.iscreate=1 and a.rsaid = #{orderid}
mapper.update: update gresa_sa_dtl set ZX_MENTE_PAYSTATE=1 where rsaid = #{rsaid}
